name: sol2ligo
description: Transpiler from Solidity to PascalLIGO language

scripts.test: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report
scripts.test-fast: SKIP_SOLC=1 mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report
scripts.test-ext-compiler: EXT_COMPILER=1 mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report
scripts.test-ext-compiler-fast: SKIP_SOLC=1 EXT_COMPILER=1 mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report
